tool.name: qiime2 feature-table group
tool.description: Group samples or features by a metadata column

param.name: table
param.label: table: FeatureTable[Frequency]
param.help: [required] The table to group samples or features on.

param.name: axis
param.label: axis: Str % Choices('feature', 'sample')
param.help: [required] Along which axis to group. Each ID in the given axis must exist in `metadata`.

param.name: type
param.label: metadata: MetadataColumn[Categorical]
param.help: [required] A column defining the groups. Each unique value will become a new ID for the table on the given `axis`.

validator.message: The first column cannot be selected (they are IDs).

param.name: mode
param.label: mode: Str % Choices('mean-ceiling', 'median-ceiling', 'sum')
param.help: [required] How to combine samples or features within a group. `sum` will sum the frequencies across all samples or features within a group; `mean-ceiling` will take the ceiling of the mean of these frequencies; `median-ceiling` will take the ceiling of the median of these frequencies.

tool.help:
QIIME 2: feature-table group ============================ Group samples or features by a metadata column
Outputs: -------- :grouped_table.qza: A table that has been grouped along the given `axis`. IDs on that axis are replaced by values in the `metadata` column.
|
Description: ------------ Group samples or features in a feature table using metadata to define the mapping of IDs to a group.
|
